attributes.additional_details: He saves animals who other vets just give up on gives animals who have cancer extra time cures animals who are paralysed he hates having to put an animal to sleep but he always does his best to save an animal even if it very obscure things that he has to do.
attributes.background: Noel Fitzpatrick does an amazing job and doesn't get very much recognition he does a job no normal vet would he does the exceptional work lots of people could do but don't.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
